instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-01041: What is 820-01041? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video problem
threads.message: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> with video problems turns on you can see the apple only a series of colored lines, I thought it was the typical problem of flex but I tried another good screen and it has the same suspicious defect a problem all gpu the tuch bar works and displays the keys, no external video

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video problem
threads.message: Did you try to boot in safe mode?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-01041</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> video problem
threads.message: No but I found out that they did some work on the gpu probably went to the beginning I was convinced that it was the mux but it's not a typical flaw
